name: CAO - La Traviata Maduro - Divino
additionalNotes: Years ago, the 93-rated CAO La Traviata dominated the market, delivering a medium to full-bodied, complex cigar experience like only CAO can. Today, weâ€™re starting down the barrel at La Traviata Maduro, the spicier, richer follow-up to this winner of a blend. Swapping out the Ecuadorian Havana wrapper leaf for a thick and oily Broadleaf, La Traviata Maduro by CAO pleases the palate with intense spice notes over dark chocolate and roasted coffee.
